level.heading: Nuisance.
level.text: Graffiti is a nuisance and the owner of the property on which the graffiti is located shall abate the graffiti or authorize the Mayor to abate the graffiti as provided for in ยง 42-3141.03.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 3 of Anti-Graffiti Emergency Act of 2010 (D.C. Act 18-389, May 5, 2010, 57 DCR 4332).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 18-219, see notes following ยง 42-3141.01.
